EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Amelia, It was a pleasure spending time with you and your team last week. I’ve outlined a summary of our call and subsequent action items should BTG decide to pursue a partnership with MBO. Here are some items we can do for BTG: · Have your team be an expert on one of our monthly webinars. You can get an idea of the types of webinars we do by going here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources>. We can work together to decide a topic and then I can introduce you to Jamie, our Marketing Coordinator to get your team setup with a date/time.· We can setup a page in our MBO Access community (www.mboaccess.com <http://www.mboaccess.com>). This is in beta at the moment, but we are rolling it out to thousands of associates and alumni in the coming month. We can create a client page for you and Marcelle and Lara from our MBO Access team can assist you in customizing your page so that it is appealing to the community to express interest. · We can create a landing page for BTG Consultants and Hiring Managers. This way your employees can easily share this link to describe the benefits of engaging through MBO, rather than working as subcontractors. Once this template page, with standard copy/language is created, we can send to you for your edits to customize for your consultants. · We can provide BTG a commission on each referral that is sent to MBO as a result of marketing our services to your audience. Some items we discussed BTG can do for MBO· If you provide us with a handful of reqs we can post these in our MBO Access community to be visible by our members. We’ll do the legwork and get them setup in the system, you would just need to send over the details via email. · As Gene mentioned, should BTG be interested in learning more about our services for companies like BTG (to help reduce risk and manage the manner in which you pay your independent contractors), I can be your main point of contact to move forward on next steps to learn more. · Advertising the MBO Service offering to your members/audience. We can assist by providing language for any newsletters, webinars or other communications you choose to advertise our services through. If you are interested in taking this to the next step, we can setup a call to discuss these items. I can also draft up a partnership document so these items are clearly outlined for each party. Look forward to working with you.
